title: Partner Program: Concert—A Moment's Notice: An Optoacoustic Performance of Contemporary Music, Inspired by László Moholy-Nagy
hero_caption: <p>László Moholy-Nagy. <em>A 19</em>, 1927. Hattula Moholy-Nagy, Ann Arbor, Michigan. © 2016 Hattula Moholy-Nagy/VG Bild-Kunst, Bonn/Artists Rig …
description:
Timed to coincide with the closing of Moholy-Nagy: Future Present, the first retrospective of the artist's work in the United States in nearly 50 years, this performance investigates the legacy of Moholy-Nagy and its relevance for late modern and contemporary experimental music.

With the participation of László Gőz (trombone, sea-shell), György Kurtág, Jr. (synthesizers, computer), Miklós Lukács (cimbalom) and Szabolcs Kerestes (visualisation)

Reserve tickets to this partner program.

Presented by the Hungarian Cultural Center
